board

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Move

  • public class Move
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction for passing around each chess Move. There are multiple ways this can be used. The toString/fromString methods are available for passing the moves online. Also, can pass the moves between objects.
    Author:
    marthaurion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Move(Piece s, Piece d)
      Create a new move from two input pieces.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string with metadata about the Move object. Useful for passing a message about the Move between computers.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • fromString

        public static Move fromString(java.lang.String str,
              Board board)
        Takes a string-ified move and converts it into a Move object.
        Parameters:
        str - String with the move metadata
        board - The Board object that the Move is being created for.
        Returns:
        Move object for the input string.
